participant_1.background:
I need to balance my work and family life.
I'm child-free, but I love my niece and nephew.
I have been known to fall off my cosplay costume.
grandma makes jewelry.
I am in my early 30s and identify as female.

participant_2.background:
I like to look at travel websites to plan my next vacation.
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
In my spare time, I refine my skills and craft my own clothing.
I have two personalities, one that is nice to my family and one that is not so nice to others.
my friends don t call my by my real name.

content.text: Hi there, I love to cosplay, but I've fallen off my costume before! What's your favorite hobby?
Hi, it's nice to meet you! I love to travel and spend time crafting in my spare time. What kind of costumes do you like to cosplay as?
I love to cosplay as characters from video games, and I'm planning on doing a cosplay of Zelda from Breath of the Wild for a convention this summer. Have you ever been to a convention before?
That sounds awesome! I haven't been to a convention before, but I've always wanted to go. I'm sure it's a lot of fun.
It's definitely a lot of fun! There's so much to see and do, and you get to meet a lot of cool people. What kind of clothing do you like to make?
I love to make dresses and skirts, but I also like to make jewelry and accessories. I'm always looking for new and interesting projects to work on.
That sounds really cool! I'm not very good at sewing, but I love to draw and paint. Maybe we could collaborate on a project sometime?
That would be awesome! I'd love to work with you on something.
Great! I'll send you a message later and we can start planning
